author: philholley27
title: Everything you are looking for!!
text: This hotel is everything you are looking for esp. if you are exhibiting in the Excel!! Couldn't leave a review without mentioning, one stand out staff and that was Paula. She couldn't do enough to help, was a real joy to be serve by and is an incredible asset to the hotel....if you didn't employee her I would :D
